Reviews.Title: “Good location.”
Reviews.Author: John G
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for two nights and thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Gym is small and gets very busy in the early evening. Also in the local area most restaurants close by 10pm, so don't leave it too late to go out to eat! In rush hour will take just over an hour by taxi (40-45 Turkish lire on the meter).

Reviews.Title: “One of the best option available in Sisli!”
Reviews.Author: LaurLuca
Reviews.Content: I am using your hotel just from last week. In 3 nights I saw that the room is very good, nice beds, nice minibar. Breakfast great, convenient as location for me.

Reviews.Title: “Alright”
Reviews.Author: melissa1233
Reviews.Content: Check in went smoothly, everyone at the reception desk is friendly and always smiling. I will start with the rooms: The rooms were very nice looking. The bed was comfortable, and the room was clean. The rooms however were LOUD. I know there was a woman above our room from her high heels pacing back and forth late at night and VERY early in the morning. I could also hear everything that was going on in the room next to me, from a cough to the phone, which sounded like it was in our room. For the listed price, this was definitely not acceptable. Fortunately, we got a good deal on the hotel... The first night upon arrival, the hotel staff was able to book a day trip in Istanbul. This was much appreciated since it was such late notice. While doing this, we had ordered room service for the next morning. The next morning, my neighbors wake up call woke us up. We never received our room service after several phone calls down to the restaurant. Finally we had to cancel because of our day trip. I was extremely impressed when we returned and the manager Onor called us to apologize and we were taken care of for our morning's mix up. The next morning at breakfast, he came up personally to make sure everything was okay. The food in the restaurant was good- The breakfast buffet was VERY pricey. It was a lot more affordable to order straight from the menu. There is also a nice grocery store a few blocks away (Turn right when leaving the hotel doors). Across the street there is a liquor store, and the owner is very friendly. The bar at the hotel was very expensive too. An Effes beer was $9 USD. The bartender was very busy when we were down there around 10. There was a lot of staff but he was the only one who could serve liquor I think.... so we were left waiting awhile before getting service. I found it very odd that the bar didn't accept cash, and the reception desk didn't have change to tip. The internet.... The hotel provides several computers for guest use, however there is NO time limit. My husband went down to try and pick our seats for our flight back home, and all of the computers were taken by teens watching movies! When he brought it up to the reception desk, he was told that they were guests and can't be kicked off. Finally my dad went up and she asked one of the guests to let us on for a few minutes. Thankfully he was kind, and stepped aside- we were only 5 minutes at most. There needs to be some limit on the usage. Every hotel I have ever been to has a pre-set timer when you log in under your room number. All in all, the staff is excellent. They really have a great crew working there. The head waiter/manager for breakfast bent over backwards to make sure everything was perfect. The woman manager at the front desk was very nice, and even asked how our tour was one day. I cannot say enough about them, and how they treated us. On the other hand, the rooms though are surprising, and not worth the money! We didn't have a good night's sleep because it was so loud! We couldn't control our heat/AC and slept with the window open which only increased the noise level. Do not stay here if you are looking to be in central Istanbul. We took a taxi each time to the city, which was somewhere around $10-$15 USD. Somewhat disappointed, but the staff and city made up for it.

Reviews.Title: “Noisy rooms”
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: I was woken up by the person above me walking in their room in high heels. I could hear the blow dryer in the next room. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room service takes forever. The buffets were very expensive, order off the menu to save a lot of money. The hotel is somewhat far from anything historical. Costs about $15 to take a cab to to sights. There is a good grocery store about 3 blocks away.

Reviews.Title: “hotel i stayed holiday inn -sisli istanbul”
Reviews.Author: susan t
Reviews.Content: great hotel pleasant stay will come back again.thanks

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nuket W
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for a week from 18/3/12. I have stayed a lot of hotels around the world, but this is the best one so far as staff is concerned. They cannot do enough for you and very genuine. Hotel itself is beautifully kept, also food is excellent. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: TOPCAT010
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn is in a first class Position if you want to take a good look at Istanbul and you have limited time ! - It is on the Metro line at Sisli - you can walk to Cevahir Centre - which is a very good shopping mall - 10 mins away - and the bus stop for the 29s will take you directly to istinge Park probably the most upmarket and largest shopping Center in Europe !! - it really is worth a day out - and it will take you a day - the bus ride is about 30mins.The Hotel itsself is comfortable - the staff are friendly and rooms are comfortable - book early to avail of a better rate.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience”
Reviews.Author: KYEONG IL S
Reviews.Content: Staffs in that hotel are very professional and kind. Always smile and try to find a solution when I faced a difficult situation. Hotel room is quite well organized and clean. If you have a chance to visit Istanbul, I sincerely recommend Holiday Inn Sisli.

Reviews.Title: “Good location in interesting neighbourhood, noisy”
Reviews.Author: naeemsiddiqi
Reviews.Content: Sisli is a 'normal' non-touristy area where you get to see Istanbul life. the hotel is comfortable, with good amenities and excellent breakfast. the only negative is that some of the rooms have non-existent sound proofing so street noise and even conversations from adjacent rooms can be heard loud and clear. Some of the hotel staff aren't English speaking. Wake up calls get messed up so use backups. subway is about 10 minutes walk away.

Reviews.Title: “Very good choice for the city life”
Reviews.Author: hakano
Reviews.Content: I stayed in a business type of the rooms at higher floors. The room was very spacious and it was very silent for good sleep quality. Also the friendliness of the hotel staff was amazing. If you want to be close to the city center in Istanbul and want to reach everywhere easily, I cannot think any better place than this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Service of the hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vitezslav E
Reviews.Content: I was happy with the service your hotel as well as its restaurant have provided to me. On top, the hotel has found the shirt I left in the room after the check out and agreed to send it back to my home address.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service”
Reviews.Author: W123-200T
Reviews.Content: I spend 4 days in the Holiday Inn Sisli for a conference. The staff was fabulous in every possible way. There were some logistic problems with attendees that had not registered but showed up unexpected and the staff of the Sisli went out of their way to facilitate all our needs even at the last moment. In one word "Outstanding!". Besides the great service, friendly attitude also the food is very worthwhile mentioning. A different 4 course meal was served every day as lunch and the quality was just awesome. If you are looking for a nice place to stay with service and food out of this world then this is your place!

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for good service”
Reviews.Author: Ston911
Reviews.Content: It's my third time in holiday inn sisli , I really feel good when I spent my holiday there , the crow is really good and have a experience to deal with all kind of people , I thanks all of holiday inn sisli crow , from the head boss to the bellboy , they all nice and good people , also the resiption, thanks ,

Reviews.Title: “"Perfect"”
Reviews.Author: traveller3530
Reviews.Content: I had booked this hotel for my wedding anniversary and also some other family members joined us in all we had 3 rooms, being a platinum member of IHG hotels i usually prefer if there is a good IHG hotel in the city in center etc. I had been in communication with Ms. Gozde before i went there to see all is fine as it was for my wedding anniversary, Ms Gozde did a great job and we all had great rooms thank you Ms Gozde, check in was nice and smooth the check in staff Ms Seda, Ms Sibel & Mr Yavuz had helped us with all the questions we have had and gave us good extra tips of where to visit in Istanbul , restaurants etc, The rooms were excellent and also the bathroom. the location i found excellent its not far from blue mosque and the grand bazaar, the hotel has a huge shopping center close by called Cevadir, i would definitely prefer this location then staying in the blue mosque area where there are so many people or tourist around. The service and hospitality of the staff is exceptional, i would like to thank all the staff including the names i mentioned above and also Mr Sedat for making this trip memorable for us all. we would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to visit Istanbul. we would be back here for sure.

Reviews.Title: “very friendly and helpful”
Reviews.Author: Shereen D
Reviews.Content: the staff is very welcoming and helpful, i asked their help many times and they didn't refuse a thing. i remember one called Sedat helped a lot and i was very pleased, i highly re command this hotel it is superb

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kiran K
Reviews.Content: Though Hotel looks small from outside, its giving excellent facilities inside. Service provided by hotel staffs are outstanding. Rooms are really good and food is also amazing.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for Business Meetings in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Milos P
Reviews.Content: I was pleasently surprised to see "different" Holiday Inn hotel during my recent meeting in Istanbul. It is very much boutique hotel feeling, with excellent food and service, and all that at very reasonable price. They also have very nice meeting facilities for small to medium size groups. Add to that a convenient location at the center of Istanbul, and I can wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to all business travelers!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jamezzzzz
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel for 5 days and found the hotel staff to be very friendly and helpful throughout my stay, especially the front office staff.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and proffesional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DeryaDokumaci
Reviews.Content: The holiday hotel is very clean, the employers are very friendly. I stayed there because of a business trip and I was suprised how everyhing was. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JavedAhmed
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nights with a group. The hotel is located on a busy road with restaurants, shops etc. It is 7-8 minutes walk to Cevahir Shopping Mall, a good place to shop if you are looking for branded stuff. The hotel is located between two Metro stations. You have to walk for 7-8 minutes from either sides to catch it. Taksim Sqaure is just one stop away on Metro. Taxis are easily available. It is far away from historical sites but honestly speaking I do not recommend to stay in the hotels near historical sites. You can't walk for long on the hilly streets of istanbul and therefore this hotel loated on a straight main road is far preferable to any other hotel. The rooms were reasonable, not very big but good size by European hotel standards. I did not particularly like the breakfast; however, I should have kept my expectations low knowing that Holiday Inn hotels are not 5* properties in the chain. Overall I am happy to recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great hospitality.”
Reviews.Author: csabamikula
Reviews.Content: One of the best business hotel in Istanbul. Good geo posÃ­tion, very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful hotel a bit away from the old town”
Reviews.Author: SandCHouston
Reviews.Content: The hotel was a bit away from the main historic part of Istanbul but the nice clean rooms and helpful staff made up for it. The front desk staff was very helpful and very attentive to our needs. Overall we really enjoyed our stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: Ken H
Reviews.Content: My wife and I along with our 2 year old daughter spent 10 days here recently and I would recommend this hotel to anyone. I have stayed with the Holiday Inn chain in the far east, midlde east and the UK and this hotel was the best of them. Friendly, helpful staff, great food and good value for money. The main street outside the hotel gets very congested as do the roads leading to / from the hotel so make sure if using taxis you speak to the conceirge who can arrange a driver who knows his way around.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to come back”
Reviews.Author: TWEE C
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay, good location with surround shopping area comfortable

Reviews.Title: “A nice choise”
Reviews.Author: Aristeidis B
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very comfortable, clean and the stuff are very kindly. The hotel is in a good area away from the center but the metro is near so you can go anywhere in istanbul. The spa is very clean and you can have time for relaxation. I thing that the cost is good enough for that hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: heund
Reviews.Content: This was the last hotel after a 2 week tour of Turkey and it was one of the best - quiet, good food, pleasant service, clean, nice pool. Roof top bar under renovation. A couple of km from Taksim Square. Only disadvantage is parking and the heavy traffic in area which can make getting to/from hotel by bus or taxi a bit slow at times.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lisamarie C
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located at the central of Istanbul, very convenient for travelers to take taxi or metro. We were upgraded to the club level room, a suite once. That was really impresive. The service is also good people there is very nice and kind. Excellent hotel for both business and leisure trip.

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel for business man in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Shiran W
Reviews.Content: This hotel have everything needed for business man: brand new rooms, large and high quality designed, clean hotel with very nice and welcoming personal, very good gym, pool and VERY central location in the heart of istanbul close to business centers as well as touristic locations. I am visiting Istanbul for almost 2 years now for business and it is my preferable hotel in the city! Service is superb and hotel is high quality and yet with reasonable prices. Perfect for business travelers.

Reviews.Title: “We were floored by the hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Ayesha_Maria
Reviews.Content: My Uncle, Rizwan Aslam Gilani booked seven rooms for our small group of 15 members (04 families). The hotel staff was courteous enough to upgrade our rooms on Executive Floor and the entire floor was exclusively for us. Seda was cheerful, ever smiling and always eager to help us out with our day to day programme. Zaki took special care of our breakfast and provided us with eggs and hot chocolate every morning. Rooms were nice and clean and well maintained. Definitely recommended for a family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, good value for money, comfortable beds!”
Reviews.Author: JEBdubai
Reviews.Content: I stay here regularly for business & find it excellent value for money. The staff are attentive and friendly. The rooms at the front have bigger bathrooms, but sometimes can be noisy with the main road outside. The rooms in the section at the back are much quieter. There is a pool in the basement which is just about big enough to do lengths, plus sauna in each changing room. The restaurant is very good - breakfast is not as deluxe as some 5 stars, but the menu for lunch, dinner & room service is good & the chef is excellent. 5 min walk to the metro, taxis easy to get. Recommend it as a business hotel, or a holiday hotel if you are not concerned about being away from the tourist areas.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, friendly staff, good location”
Reviews.Author: FairfieldInnMidway
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Sisli in August while on a family trip to Istanbul and had a great time. Istanbul is such a great place to visit, learn about and explore first hand. It is a modern metropolis with so much history and ancient taste. I will definitely be back some day to visit again and will for sure stay at the Holiday Inn, Sisli. The hotel is spotless! The rooms and public space were immaculate - very clean and well kept. It is coveniently located to public transportation and shops. The best part of my stay though was the interaction with the staff!!! Everyone was really friendly and eager to help. They really take pride in what they do! Although everyone was really great, there is one person that stood out - Sedat! He is born to be in the hospitality industry. He helped me so much with directions and explanations on how to get places, where to go and what to do and always with a smile on his face. He would alwasy greet me and ask me if I need anything with so much sincerity and kindness. He really makes a difference!!! Thank you for a great stay!!! Elena Nikolova

Reviews.Title: “Very classy place”
Reviews.Author: Sam77710
Reviews.Content: I loved this hotel especially my room wow it was very nice & classy the furniture is very modern & nice The service was good The breakfast was ok I simply love t! Can't wait to go back there again :)

Reviews.Title: “They don't have a "no" as an answer”
Reviews.Author: Gilbert2282
Reviews.Content: It was great experience since employees were really helpful and tried to impress us all the time. The hotel location is great too. We were impressed by the concierge service where (Yavez, concierge) has took us to a different level of hospitality and helped us re-organise our entire vacation plans and the touching part is that he was so positive and trying to overcome obstacles and never gave up although he could have done it at any stage. This blew us up and made the remaining of our vacation a great one.

Reviews.Title: “Out of the way but at ease...”
Reviews.Author: cvkstchr
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the financial district of Istanbul and far from Ataturk Airport. Many airport services try to rip you off in the effort to get you to the location in Sisli. Additionally, the hotel is quite a distance from Sultamehet and so the Old City where the tourist attractions are located is a hassle to get to. So, if money is not a problem it is worth your while. The facility is clean and comfortable. The conceirge, Anur, was so helpful in helping me plan my trip to Fethiye. The people at the front desk are polite as well. One small issue was the front desk people did not necessarily agree with one another on the best route to the Grand Bazaar..Oh yes, and the breakfast buffet was not that great. But hey, what do Turks know about breakfast?

Reviews.Title: “Best Service and outstanding breakfasts”
Reviews.Author: Deborah K
Reviews.Content: Having been to Turkey before but never to Istanbul we were lucky enough to stay at this fabulous hotel not once but twice on our holiday tour of Turkey in May the service throughout the hotel was great but having traveled and lived all over the world the breakfast was a winner, the staff were outstanding and were worthy of the praise they received. The manager was gracious of the praise they duly deserved. I have no link to this hotel and have never reviewed a holiday or hotel before but if more people could just try to do what the manager and staff are trying so hard to do I think there would be many more Happy Travellers. Well done all of you.... Regards a very very fussy traveller hope to see you all soon.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay at Holiday Inn, Sisli Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: MeetMonty
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at the Holiday Inn at Sisli, Istanbul. The staff in this hotel is very friendly and hospitable. The hotel is very centrally located on the main street with all shopping available around the place, also there is a famous & a big mall next to the hotel (5 mins walk). The metro station is also inside the mall, making it easy to travel. The hotel has spa facilites and the famous Hammam bath. Overall a wonderuful stay. Recommended for business & holiday travellers. Thank you Holiday Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Luxury Business hotel”
Reviews.Author: trivengupta
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic hidden jewel in Istanbul. Located in the heart of Sisli ( a small district) - it is walking distance from local shopping, eateries and business district You can take a cab to the blue mousque - hotel staff is very helpful in guinding you. Great Breakfast - and nice cocktails at the bar Rooms are at par with any leading luxury hotel in the world - dont go by the rate and the tag - this is a steal

Reviews.Title: “hotel was ok, but i did not feel tat i am a platinuim customer”
Reviews.Author: abed28
Reviews.Content: i had two rooms and unfortunately, i did not feel that i am a VIP customer. simply, was not given a connected room.

Reviews.Title: “Well treated, from the beginning to the end.”
Reviews.Author: Cyr_11
Reviews.Content: I went to this hotel for a four day stay with my mother. Every single member of the staff is fluent in English, though of Turkish descent, and an "European atmosphere" is felt since you enter the hotel. The reception is polite, provides us with all the information we need. The SPA seems complete, including Saunas, Steam Baths, a swimming pool, a fully-equipped gym. The hotel room itself is well technologically-furnished: a card is used for access, and a permanent free wireless internet connection is provided. I enjoyed my stay at the hotel, being well taken care of, feeling comfortable whether in the SPA, the room, or the restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “Elegant, neat and well situated...We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: adelzom
Reviews.Content: Holiday Inn Istanbul Sisli is differentiated with its affordability, elegancy and the level of order the whole hotel amenities are in. Not to mention of course the friendly and caring staff. I always enjoy staying there both for business and leisure trips. A. Muna

Reviews.Title: “we had a good time and hopefully we will be back”
Reviews.Author: yoseph70
Reviews.Content: the service is very good , the rooms are in excellent condition. ,the hotel overall enjoys very high qulity. it's placed in a great spot of the city . disadvantaged : is that some of the employees do not speak english which makes it hard to communicate, because english is usually a common langue ! and the hotel should offer free water cap for the swimming pool.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for making my stay magnificent !!”
Reviews.Author: karimh
Reviews.Content: It was my first trip to Istanbul, and choosing the Holiday Inn Sisli was the main reason why I loved this city: We arrived earlier than expected, but we only waited few minutes to get our suite, with a warm welcoming and high level of experience of the staff. The suite was really nice, bed really comfortable, very fast internet connection, loved the bathroom and all the amenities in the suite. i didnt have time to go to the spa, but i went to check it and looked lovely, with an excellent swimming pool that calls you to relax. I want to thank the great staff, especially Orhan and the receptionists Sibel, Seda, Nese, Hande who always helped us when getting down to the reception. also, the bellboy staff were amazing, really helpful and showed that they really care: Sedat, Volkan, Hakan and Melih (I hope i didnt miss anyone!!!) especially when they knew that the taxi (not a hotel taxi) took 50 liras from taksim to sisli :( Except that i only visited the hotel once, but i feel like it's my house in istanbul. I will be coming back for sure. Thank you for making my stay magnificent !!

Reviews.Title: “"a very generous and delightful stay"”
Reviews.Author: OlaOsman
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the holiday Inn was simply ideal. To begin with, the services at the hotel were very elite and prestigious. The staff are very welcoming, polite, and open to help at any time. And last but not least, although the hotel was relatively crowded at the time, all staff managed to run the hotel very smoothely and calmly, and still provide everyone with the five star services promised.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience - great customer service”
Reviews.Author: ggarnold
Reviews.Content: I am visiting Istanbul on business trips several times a month and usually book hotels according to meeting places in the city. However since I started to visit this hotel last year, I am staying there as often as possible. Next to a refreshing, clean atmosphere this hotel stands out by a fantastic customer understanding and centricity and a service with the 'personal' touch. The effectiveness and the friendliness of the staff stands out - even in a city like Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: dretcher7
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel for my honeymoon, and it was a great experience , the staff was very helpful and the location was very convenient, i would like to thank everyone for the good job, and special thank for orhan whom who gave a call about my stay after check out. I recommend this hotel and I will stay again!!!! thank you all !!! Idriss

Reviews.Title: “A perfect place for business traveler”
Reviews.Author: JoroLukov
Reviews.Content: Excellent room, breakfast and service. Hotel is walking distance from metro station. This hotel will be my Nr 1 selection for all future trips to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Istanbul - Holiday Inn Sisli”
Reviews.Author: 187291Frank
Reviews.Content: I needed to visit Istanbul last month for a business trip and picked the Holiday Inn Sisli as hotel, because it was close to the organization that I needed to visit. I really didn't know what to expect, but Even if it was only a short trip I was really satisfied. The hotel was really good and I enjoyed the stay. I had free Internet (which is important for me), it was quite silent - even if it is located quite centrally, the subway is less than 10 min by feet and the food and breakfast was also enjoyable. Overall I personally can only recommend that hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Sure, i'll come back....”
Reviews.Author: Khaled-Hijazi
Reviews.Content: I love this hotel, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Most friendly staff ever. As for the GM she was wonderful, kind, helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “I definitely recommend Holiday Inn Sisli if you want to enjoy your trip”
Reviews.Author: AlinaYu
Reviews.Content: Honestly speaking, I'm captious in the matter of selection the place to stay. That was not the first trip to Istanbul, so I used to stay at different other hotels before and mainly it were 5 stars. And I can say that Holiday Inn Sisli was the excellent choise. Suitable location, the morden design of the rooms, cleannes, big bath and friendly stuff, who are willing to help you all the time these are the reasons why I'm going to stay in this hotel during my next trip to Istanbul. I recommend Holiday Inn Sisli if you want to enjoy your trip!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel - very central”
Reviews.Author: CAROCAET
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Istanbul-Sisli is very central and the staff were extremely helpful and courteous to our large group of 37 people who arrived just before midnight! We enjoyed our short stay before we boarded our cruise ship and found the rooms very well appointed, clean and comfortable. The breakfast the next morning was plentiful and delicious in a lovely modern diningroom. Overall, a great experience and can highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and decent service”
Reviews.Author: mnasr
Reviews.Content: This is our second trip to Istanbul. We liked the hotel and enjoyed our stay there. The location is great, the room was clean, the service was decent, and the staff were very friendly. We stayed there for one week and we definitely like to be back.

Reviews.Title: “I like so much...and I will be there again”
Reviews.Author: angeloroma79
Reviews.Content: I like to much the place, the services and the staff. Perfect location, both for shopping and tourism tour.

Reviews.Title: “A Well Placed Hotel”
Reviews.Author: crrsad
Reviews.Content: I usually choose the Holiday Inn Sisli whenever I'm on a business trip to Istanbul. It is very well located near the center of the capital and the staff are very gracious and professional. Also the gym and pool are quite pleasant to use.

Reviews.Title: “Very good. I will stay again.”
Reviews.Author: takyamakoshi
Reviews.Content: The location is not the best for me, but the fitness (with TANITA professional body composition analyser), Pool, Haman are wonderful. It is often problem to have excersise in Istanbul as the air in the city is not so nice and I was looking for a hotel near from the sea, while the car traffic is often heavy there. This is a nice alternative. The room is also clean and perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Great solution for a business stay”
Reviews.Author: IrinaSo
Reviews.Content: I was staying at Holiday Inn in Sisli several times due to business reasons, and would absolutely recommend it as an option for others. Would like to highlight the staff's friendliness, quality of the rooms and constructive guest relationships management. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, definitely recommended”
Reviews.Author: mshatila32
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 4 nights, the hotel is clean, room is medium in size but has everything you might need, staff are courteous, Yousuf at front desk was helpful, gave us a nice room upgrade. The location is not as advertised being close to Taksim. It's actually a 1 hr walk away, and approx 20-30 minute by car depending on traffic. Breakfast food lacks variety, the majority of the buffet items is cheese. All in all, the hotel is definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: Paul_Oxford_11
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel while on a short business trip. The rooms were excellent with first class facilities and there was a very good gym in the basement. The staff were some of the best I have encountered and couldn't have been more helpful. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Very Hospitable and Friendly!”
Reviews.Author: Siddharth_G
Reviews.Content: Holiday Inn Sisli definitely lives up to the expectations one can have from a 5 star hotel! The staff is extremely hospitable and ever smiling. They are always ready to share a word or two in conversation with you no matter how difficult their day might have been. Willing to go out of their way to make you feel comfortable. The property (incl. the rooms, corridors, lobby, etc) in general is fresh, well maintained and has a pleasant ambience. Overall an exellent choice for any duration of stay all round the year.

Reviews.Title: “Very Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: tgoeldenitz
Reviews.Content: I was holding a conference in this hotel. It was excellent value for money. The price was reasonable and many items that are sometimes charged additional were given for free - that included the sound system and speakers, it included LCD projector. Additionally the hotel does respect the loyalty statuses of the group (Priority Club) and gave me the following day free access to the club lounge although I was strictly speaking not in the hotel anymore. The staff were very helpful and service minded.

Reviews.Title: “Central location - Good for business travelers”
Reviews.Author: Ko_Uri
Reviews.Content: Friendly and effective staff, comfortable room and free wifi. Excellent beds and room amenities. My room suffered from low water pressure (probably shower rush hour..:-) but the next day all was fine. Breakfast was sufficient and fresh. Mostly recommended for business travelers and less for tourists. Central location, not too big which gives a cozy feeling. I will be back for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Simple, Elegant, good location”
Reviews.Author: Medoz
Reviews.Content: stayed there for 5 nights for business trip. Very nice room, good size, comfortable bed & typical turkis bath. the breakfast was very good. the staff were helpful. 5 minutes from takseem, many resturants around and Javaher mall is 5 minutes walk. if you are visiting turkey for business trip, the location is excellent, if your visit is for tourism, it's very good as metro station is 10 min. walk and taxis available 24 hours.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, but for tourists not ideally location”
Reviews.Author: OSNT-DXB
Reviews.Content: Great hotel - not too large, stylish, pretty new and beautiful rooms. Good choice if you are on business in that side of town, for tourists the location is a bit off and you need to walk a few 100 meters, then take the metro to get to Taksim Square. Rooms in the front are a bit noisy due to the main road right in front of them.

Reviews.Title: “I have been there so many times. Recommended!!”
Reviews.Author: Gidi_Farkash
Reviews.Content: The staff is efficient and helpful, the rooms are great. Big enough, very comfortable and with free WiFi for biz guests. The bath is a typical Turkish one, big and very cozy. Breakfast is served in the restaurant (Lobby) and has everything you would like. The service there is also perfect. Location is good since Sisli is the place to be shown in Istanbul, very close (by walk - 20 minutes, by Taxi - 5) to Taksim square, etc.

Reviews.Title: “All right on the night...but a few small but significant errors..."”
Reviews.Author: Ravenna2006
Reviews.Content: The Holiday Inn Sisli is the better and more modern of the two Holiday Inn franchised properties in Istanbul. It's located in the bustling Sisli district that it great for fashion shopping (not for souvenirs). It is on the Asian side of the city and is about 3.5km to Taksim square. There is a metro line nearby that will enable you to get around if you don't want to pay for taxis. + Very clean and modern furnishings that are comfortable + Beds are amazingly comfortable + Breakfast is a plentiful buffet + Good location for Taksim area of city + Fitness club is excellent - modern and lots of equipment + swimming pool - Staff quality is highly variable - Rooms at front of hotel are noisy because of busy avenue below - ask for a room at the back of the hotel - Unless you use public transport, you will spend around $45 per day on taxis too and from European side of the city (where all the monuments are) - Hotel bar completely overpriced - $15 for a glass of wine. Overall, I had a positive experience of the hotel. As a Platinum Priority Club card holder, I should have received an upgrade at check-in to a suite but the young lady at reception was frankly not very helpful - gave me the classic 'talk to the manager' in the morning brush-off. Having said that, the executive room was clean, refurbished with an excellent bathroom - spacious and marble everywhere. The following morning, I asked for a suite and was given one in the hotel - a much more customer focused young man helped me at the reception. Anyway, the suite had...motion sensor taps in the washbasins that only provided cold water!!!!! Naturally, I called reception to ask about this and THANKS TO THE GREAT HELP of the receptionist Yusuf, the taps were replaced with proper mixer taps immediately and when I came back to my room, I found a bowl of fruit and a bottle of wine waiting for me. Great recovery! :)
